summary:
The Security Council,
 
Recalling previous resolutions and statements on Burundi and the Great Lakes region,
 Reaffirming commitment to Burundi's sovereignty, independence, territorial integrity, and unity,
 Congratulating the people of Burundi on a successful transitional period and peaceful transfer of authority,
 Welcoming ongoing negotiations between the Burundian Government and Palipehutu-FNL,
 Noting expiring mandates of ONUB and MONUC,
 Takes note of the Secretary-General's report on ONUB,
 Noting remaining instability factors in Burundi and the region,

 
1. Extends ONUB's mandate until 31 December 2006;
2. Extends until 30 September 2006 authorization to redeploy troops from ONUB to MONUC;
3. Welcomes Secretary-General's intention to establish an integrated UN office in Burundi;
4. Decides to remain seized of the matter.
